page.title: 09'Bright Eyes' in Kirby Hill
page.content: A group of us, while working on this project, saw two men with Springer Spaniels, who were called Honey and Jenny.One of the men had a shot gun with under and over barrelsanda size seven cartridge. We saw some rabbit holes and a dead rabbit. The farmer went through the corn with his dogs to see if there were some rabbits so they would be driven into the holes. The other man had a spoon tied onto a shaft and he had a tin with poison in. He put the poison down a rabbit hole. I found out that when the poison hit moisture it turns into a gas. My Dad told me that the poison is called Cymag which is a white powder. I think that some of the wild rabbits should be gassed because they eay away the shoots of corn. You don't want to gas all the rabbits because they will eat the weeds as well.
